item.description:
This is a general admission ticket so you are on your own purchasing a ticket. The ticket now $25.00. Lets get there for 7:20, since this is general admission, we will want to get there early to get good seating. This is at the Iseman Theater NOT Yale Rep.
http://drama.yale.edu...

Anyone interested in a drink or dinner before the show, we will meet at 6:00 at Sullivan's On Chapel
I need to know if you intend to join us at the restaurant, we are a rather large group so a count is important for a reservation!!!

Sullivan's on Chapel
1166 Chapel St
New Haven, CT 06511
(203) 777-4367


A Streetcar Named Desire
By Tennessee Williams
Directed by Charlotte Brathwaite
The show starts at 8:00
“All good art is an indiscretion.”
- Tennessee Williams
This production of Tennessee Williams's greatest tragedy interrogates the corrosive power of the American dream. Set in a landscape of urban decline, the dreams of Stanley, Stella, Blanche, and Mitch are invaded as they are launched on a blood-pumping, heartbreaking rollercoaster of sex, power, violence and nostalgia.

There are two parking lots on York: Chapel-York Garage and another lot on the right side behind Yale Rep.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the front of the theater
item.name: A Streetcar Named Desire
